text: A tract, is a short literary work that is written to convince somebody of an idea or belief. ==Overview== Tracts see applications in politics by those promoting propaganda, or in religion by those promoting their religious beliefs. They are often either left for someone to find, or handed out for free. ==Related pages== * Fiction * Polemic * Publishing * Non-fiction Category:Genres Category:History Category:Culture Category:Religious texts
